review: I had went there for root canal treatment. The whole process was explained in advance so that I would keep calm and remain patient. Dr Jayna had made this treatment to extreme ease. She handled my case with much patience and care and I really appreciate her efforts . Keep doing the good work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I had a good experience with Doctor Jayna.I was explained the issue and given good advice. Also, the dental cleaning experience was prompt and hygienic. 
What I liked best was that even when I checked with Doctor if I should go for teeth whitening etc, they did not push me and recommended me not to go for it as I did not require it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Happy with everything there, thank you doctor  Jayna but  feeling slightly discomfort on my teeth due to the scaling thing done . I know all will be fine soon .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited for dental cavity related issues. Nicely explained the problem and it's solution. Satisfied with the treatment.
It was a great experience & this is the first treatment where I didn’t experience any pain! It was a satisfying experience & was a good job done
